# items

**Instance Property**

The array of queued items.

## Declaration

```swift
var items: [WKAudioFilePlayerItem] { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains the array of queued [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKAudioFilePlayerItem] objects. The initial contents of this array are set at initialization time but you may add or remove items using the methods of this class.

## Managing Items

- **advanceToNextItem()**: Ends playback of the current item and begins playing the next item in the queue.
- **appendItem(_:)**: Adds the specified item to the end of the queue.
- **removeItem(_:)**: Removes the specified item from the queue.
- **removeAllItems()**: Removes all items from the queue.

items.description: Ends playback of the current item and begins playing the next item in the queue.

items.description: Adds the specified item to the end of the queue.
items.name: appendItem(_:)

items.description: Removes the specified item from the queue.

items.description: Removes all items from the queue.
